captions.text: ...and welcome to another Impossible Let's Play!
...Don't Let Go for the Oculus Rift.
Okay, I'm ready to get started. Let's do this!
OW - why do I do this to myself?! Let's go!
... it didn't do it the first time I pressed it.
Still not sure if you're... if you're bees or FLIIIES...
Oh, my Oculus Rift is already drifting upwards!
AH - it's the worst on the left hand!
It's so much worse on the left hand.
It's like I got better contact on it or something.
I forgot about you. You get out of there.
It's good to see you agaaaain!
You wanna come over and gimme a big lick?
Why don't you lick this device down here...
...then we can reaaally get this party started!
I wonder if you can see my muscles twitching over there.
That started out as a fake, like, sarcastic "oh, no"...
Oh, nevermind. This is absolutely ridiculous.
...aahh, my hand is suddenly spamsing out of control.
Sorry, I was in the middle something.
Were you trying to interrupt me?
I didn't mean to do that!
"Well, maybe this isn't scary enough for you."
"Do you know there's a giant spider behind this laptop?"
My hands are like going numb.
I think I'm getting used to it.
I'm trying not to let go and... goodness gravy.
You wanna--don't wanna touch that hand yet...
Hope you guys can-- I hope...
...because I never tried a record setup...
I hear. I feel. I hear and feel.
Ah, you son of a bitch!
I know I played this before, but you're a son of a bitch!
Why do I do this to myself?!
...I have to do it to myself literally.
My keyboard is drifting away from me.
All right, you gonna do your little sword dance...
...and then I'm gonna try to hold on for my dear life!
Because I'm almost letting go. My fingers are tired.
I wonder if the battery is dying, because...
...it's either my hands are getting numb...
...or the battery in the machine is dying.
What kind of moron am I?!
It's so... it's like totally different each time.
Yes, I know. I know. Hi. Hey.
AH - it's like totally different each t-AH!
Get out! Out of my ear! Out of my ear!

I turned the volume-AAH-way up louder
then I had it before.
UHH. Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!

"Guess you win. Weell, let me try one more thing."
You got a surprise me? Ookay.
UUU, I wonder what that's all about!
This is what I do for a living!
So that was the electroshock challenge.
I didn't... like, I wanted to tone it back down...
I'm sweating so much from that!
Oooh, that was so much fun!
It was like... it wasn't... it wasn't painful.
I don't want people to worry like:
This is like a... this like a...
I just had it and I wanted to play it, so...
That was Don't Let Go, and I didn't let go! I didn't!
So if you enjoyed this video...
...and you enjoy these impossible let's plays...
...aaany other challenge you want me to do.
But aaany other challenge you want me to do.
Thank you all so much for watching!

title: Impossible Let's Play: ELECTRIC SHOCK CHALLENGE

comments.author: Allison Li

comments.text:
First of all you people have to stop telling someone to kill themselves 
just because they stated their opinion. She deserves respect whether she's 
right or wrong because she's only human. Second, Allison, I am a fan of 
both mark and pewdiepie, and I don't think this is true. Firstly it 
wouldn't really matter if he did copy because they get along anyways. You 
could say that he got inspired form pewds to do this , but he didn't copy 
him because not even pewds is the first one to do this. And what's to say a 
person like me who's a fan of both didn't watch this video, say "hey, I 
wonder what it'd be like if mark did this" and request mark do it. And 
thinks bout how you would feel if someone commented " pewdie copied mark". 
This comment is like saying mark copied pewdiepie breathing, and because 
pewdie was the first one to breathe, mark can't breathe anymore because 
it's copying pewdie. You should really think about what you're staying 
before you comment because people will get angry and upset.
comments.author: kittypie

comments.text:
Allison yes I can say to someone that he didn't. How do you know pewds 
didn't see that somewhere else and copy it or use it? These you tubers are 
allowed to use other people's ideas just because they use another's ideas 
does not mean they stole it or copied it maybe they want to try it for 
themselves to make their viewers who might not follow the others laugh
